description: The world of DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS 2 has become your oyster! Check the mailbox in your Isle of Awakening to discover that a fishing island awaits you with a net full of quests and characters to meet. Learn how to catch 40 different fish that can be added to your own DIY aquarium. Unlock an additional tool – the fishing rod – recipes, as well as customization options, including swimwear, straw hats, and ponytail hairstyle.
name: Aquarium Pack
